subject: Indian Polity
topic: E-Governance aur Good Governance ki Avdharna
question_en: What is the role of e-governance in promoting good governance?
question_hi: ई-सरकार के लिए अच्छे लक्ष्यों को प्रदेश में प्रस्तुति क्या होती है?
A_en: E-governance plays a crucial role in disseminating information and making government services accessible to citizens.
